mapper.insert: insert into FILE_TBL(FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_CRT_DATE) values (#{file_nm}, #{file_path}, SYSDATE());
insert into CMPY_TBL ( CMPY_NM , CMPY_REP , FILE_IDX ) values ( #{cmpy_nm}, #{cmpy_rep}, LAST_INSERT_ID());
mapper.select: select C.CMPY_NM, C.CMPY_REP, F.FILE_PATH from CMPY_TBL C inner join FILE_TBL F on C.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};
select C.CMPY_NM, C.CMPY_REP, F.FILE_PATH from CMPY_TBL C inner join FILE_TBL F on C.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where CMPY_NM= #{cmpy_nm} and CMPY_REP = #{cmpy_rep};
select FT.FILE_NM, FT.FILE_PATH from CMPY_TBL CT inner join FILE_TBL FT on CT.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX where CT.CMPY_NM = #{value}
mapper.delete: delete FT from FILE_TBL FT inner join CMPY_TBL CT on FT.FILE_IDX = CT.FILE_IDX where CT.CMPY_NM = #{value} and FT.FILE_NM != "base_profile"
